name: Venatio (Ildfuglen)
description:
Welcome to Venatio!

Set in ancient Greece, our once seemingly invincible hero has found himself in dire straights. After being taken captive he must now fight in the Colosseum for his freedom. The goddess Alethina that has been watching over our hero fears for his safety. She intervenes to save her champion, gifting him the amulet of Yendor. Each of the seven stones within the amulet allow our hero to restore himself to life one time.
The gods are watching and both sides are will have their hands in your fate. Fight for your freedom, you WILL die, but will you also survive?

How to Play
  • WASD - Move
  • Left Mouse Button - Primary Attack
  • Right Mouse Button - Secondary Attack
  • Q - Equip Weapon Left Hand
  • E - Equip Weapon Right Hand
  • Escape - Exit Game
  • 1 - 4 - Use Skill

Beat your enemies with sticks!


Sacrifice life to acquire skills!

Use your skills to overpower your enemies!

Equip stronger weapons to gain the upper hand in combat!

...And try not to die

Thank you for playing!
